data.eml:eml: A new species of Xenobatrachus (Anura, Microhylidae) with a striking resemblance to Xenorhina bouwensi

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Günther, Rainer, Knop, Ronny (2006): A new species of Xenobatrachus (Anura, Microhylidae) with a striking resemblance to Xenorhina bouwensi. Zootaxa 1268: 39-57, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173194
